## Geometry.indices property

The underlying index buffer.

Only present if indices were declared on initialization.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly indices: T['indices'] extends {
        buffer: SyncableBuffer;
    } | {
        data: ArrayBufferView;
    } ? SyncableBuffer : T['indices'] extends {
        buffer: Buffer;
    } ? Buffer : undefined;
```
